problem.markdown:
1. For a MDOF system roots of frequency equation
(x) Are Eigen Values () Do not exist () Are all equal () None of these 2. A motor of mass 1000 Kg is kept on a foundation of stiffness 100 N/mm, then ωn in rad/s is
() 1000 () 100 (x) 10 () None of these
3. For effective isolation, frequency ratio should be greater than
() 0.707 () None of these () 1 (x) 1.414
4. Lagrange’s equation is used to find ____ of a MDOF
() None of these () Modes () Frquencies (x) Governing Differential Equation
5. Theoretically the number of modes of a steel scale held at one end (cantilever)
() 0 (x) ∞ () 1 () None of these
